front.title: IEEE Standard Requirements for Subsurface, Vault, and Padmounted Load-Interrupter Switchgear and Fused Load-Interrupter Switchgear for Alternating Current Systems up to 38 kV

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Required definitions, ratings, procedures for performing design tests and production tests, and construction requirements for subsurface, vault, and padmounted load-interrupter switchgear and fused load-interrupter switchgear for ac systems up to 38 kV are covered in this standard.
